Reviews.Title: Best Nikon FX for the money
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I also own a D3S and love it as well, but when considering the D4, looked at the D800E and realized everything I want to do is in it with a higher resolution sensor and a flash for home photography, but ready for my pro equipment when needed.  A very nice balance for a great price.
